head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RICHMAN, ZELDA (NEE SHAPIRO)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RICHMAN, ZELDA (NEE SHAPIRO)

block.p: RICHMAN-Zelda (nee Shapiro). Of Hackensack on May 30, 2000. Beloved wife of Isadore, dear sister of Faye Gosseen, devoted stepmother of Amy Reisfield and Robert Richman, loving stepgrandmother of Adam. Services will be held ''Gutterman-Musicant'' Hackensack on Friday June 2, at 10 AM. Should friends desire contributions to Hackensack Hospital Hospice or New Jersey Hospice would be appreciated.
